alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southern Baker, Union, central Columbia and northwestern Clay Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 535 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanderson to near Olustee to near Suwannee Valley. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Lake Butler, Raiford, Middleburg, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Palestine Community, Winfield, Olustee and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Duval
